content: The following steps might be helpful: "Settings" > "Accounts" section > tap the account you want to configure > "Sending mail" > tick "Upload sent messages (Upload sent messages to Sent folder after sending)".
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: Thanks for the advice. The box is checked. I tried unchecking it and checking it again, but to no avail.
creator: robo844

content: additional information: - if you delete an email from your inbox, it is not saved in the trash - it is completely lost. - I tried to delete the account and set it up again - without success - the error is definitely in Thunderbird. I created a profile with the same settings in the Samsung email app and everything works 100% without problems.
creator: robo844
